# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(RectilinearProject2D)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
RectilinearProject2DPluginInfo.C
RectilinearProject2DCommonPluginInfo.C
RectilinearProject2DAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
RectilinearProject2DPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
RectilinearProject2DGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisRectilinearProject2DWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisRectilinearProject2DWindow.h
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
RectilinearProject2DViewerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
RectilinearProject2DEnginePluginInfo.C
avtRectilinearProject2DFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
    SET(PYINCLUDES ${PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH} ${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visitpy/visitpy)
ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Abstract
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/CMFE
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Conditional
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Derivations
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/General
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/ImageProcessing
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Management
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/MeshQuality
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/TimeIterators
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/IVP
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/QtVisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/View
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Colleagues
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Interactors
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Proxies
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Tools
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/gui
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/mdserver/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/mdserver/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/main
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/winutil
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${QT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${EAVL_INCLUDE_DIR} 
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${PYINCLUDES}
)


LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${QT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${GLEW_LIBRARY_DIR} ${EAVL_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IRectilinearProject2DOperator ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IRectilinearProject2DOperator visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IRectilinearProject2DOperator)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    QT_WRAP_CPP(GRectilinearProject2DOperator LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})
    ADD_LIBRARY(GRectilinearProject2DOperator ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GRectilinearProject2DOperator visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VRectilinearProject2DOperator ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VRectilinearProject2DOperator visitcommon viewer )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GRectilinearProject2DOperator VRectilinearProject2DOperator)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            RectilinearProject2DScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyRectilinearProject2DAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SRectilinearProject2DOperator ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SRectilinearProject2DOperator visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SRectilinearProject2DOperator)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY RectilinearProject2DAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/operators)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaRectilinearProject2D ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} RectilinearProject2DAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ERectilinearProject2DOperator_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ERectilinearProject2DOperator_ser visitcommon avtexpressions_ser avtfilters_ser avtpipeline_ser )
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ERectilinearProject2DOperator_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ERectilinearProject2DOperator_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ERectilinearProject2DOperator_par visitcommon avtexpressions_par avtfilters_par avtpipeline_par )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ERectilinearProject2DOperator_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_OPERATOR_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(operators ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(operators RectilinearProject2D ${INSTALLTARGETS})
